name: Arcade Boy (Code Scribe, MithraArt, nappa22428, KarP7)
name_original: Arcade Boy (Code Scribe, MithraArt, nappa22428, KarP7)
description:
A simple 2D platformer created for the LMOB Beginners Game Jam #28. Unfortunately the game is unfinished. The sounds are placeholders and there were more levels that were not added. We plan to finish this game after the game jam ends.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Spacebar to jump

Left-click to shoot with the powerup
